amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that allows Governors to transfer appropriated funds between the Youth Development Grant and the Adult Education Grant programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional record to strike the provisions of the bill that allow governors to transfer appropriated funds between the Youth Development Grant and the Adult Education Grant programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
